title: M416
details: The HK416, (referred to as the M416 in-game) is an assault rifle/carbine type weapon in BATTLEGROUNDS.The HK416 is a German Assault Rifle.

title: AKM
details: The AKM is an assault rifle type weapon in BATTLEGROUNDS. The AKM is an improved version of another popular weapon, the AK-47.

title: SCAR-L
details: The SCAR-L is an assault rifle type weapon in BATTLEGROUNDS. The SCAR-L is a very versatile weapon that can be used in a variety of situations.

title: M16A4
details: The M16A4 is an assault rifle type weapon in BATTLEGROUNDS. The M16A4 is a versatile weapon that can be used in a variety of situations.

title: GROZA
details: The Groza is an assault rifle type weapon in BATTLEGROUNDS. The Groza is a very powerful weapon that can be used in a variety of situations.
